name: ヘビーメタル
description: RiotCorp社のグラディエーター式の闘技場には、最強のロボットファイター同士の戦いを見るために、世界中から観客が集まってくる。「フルメタルロボット ファイトリーグ」の王者となるのか、それとも破壊されて終わるのか──栄光を夢見て、ファイターたちは熱い戦いを繰り広げる。

wikiSkinData.lore: In the year 20XX, RiotCorp rules the world with a cruel, robotic fist. Building his own battling best friend using code from a forgotten video game (and piles and piles of scrap!) a young mechanic competes in the company's corporate-sanctioned Rift Wars—for fame, glory, and [ERROR] [...] [TOWERDIVING!]

skins.name: フルメタル ラムス

wikiSkinData.lore: Those who make it to the Full Metal Robot Fighting League—the premier institution for gear-crunching, robot-on-robot violence—must often face off against the fearsome Full Metal Rammus. It is an initial rite of passage, faced by every contender-bot, that leaves entire arenas in tremors...

skins.name: フルメタル パンテオン

wikiSkinData.lore: A former Full Metal Robot Fighting League champion (2x reign, 14 title defenses), Pantheon was forced to retire in disgrace after a scandal involving Targon Fabrications. Reemerging from retirement to face the chosen champion, Jayce, Pantheon may be damaged, but has found that revenge adequately charges his weapon systems.

skins.name: フルカスタム ビクター

wikiSkinData.lore: Created from the same circuitry as the Full Metal champion, Jayce, Viktor was cast into the tunnels beneath the robot fighting arenas to serve as a janitoribot—while his twin was groomed for glory, simulcast en español. Upgrading himself with the cast-offs of the destroyed, he has sworn la venganza.

skins.name: フルメタル ジェイス

wikiSkinData.lore: Backed by RiotCorp as the Full Metal Fighting League's first corporately sanctioned champion, Jayce has dethroned Pantheon and won the hearts of audiences worldwide—especially those who realize they gain 15 Riot Points every time they cheer his cyclonic blasts.
